THRIVE Reading List

Navigating Academia and the Workplace

  • A Black Woman’s Guide to Earning a Ph.D.: Surviving the First 2 Years by Nicole A. Telfer, ISBN: 9781664130036
  • Academic Ableism: Disability and Higher Education by Jay T. Dolmage, ISBN: 9780472053711
  • Black STEM USA: America’s Next Civil Rights Movement by C.M. Williams and Sharon Ewell Foster, ISBN:9780996870702
  • Decolonizing Academia: Poverty, Oppression and Pain by Clelia O. Rodríguez, ISBN: 9781773630748
  • Hooded: A Black Girl’s Guide to the Ph.D. by Malika Grayson, ISBN: 9781953307
  • Our Doctoral Journey: A Collection of Black Women’s Experiences by Dr. Nicole A. Telfer, ISBN: 9781669827092
  • Surviving Your Stupid Stupid Decision to Go to Grad School by Dr. Adam Ruben, ISBN: 9780307589446
  • Twice as Hard: The Stories of Black Women Who Fought to Become Physicians, from the Civil War to the Twenty-First Century by Jasmine Brown, ISBN: 9780807025086

STEMM-Focused

  • The Disordered Cosmos: A Journey into Dark Matter, Spacetime, and Dreams Deferred by Dr. Chanda Prescod-Weinstein, ISBN: 9781541724709

Academic Fiction

  • Real Life by Brandon Taylor, ISBN: 9780525538882
  • Failure to Thrive: A Medical Student’s Novel by C.C. Green ISBN: 9798885040631
  • On Rotation by Dr. Shirlene Obuobi ISBN: 9780063209145
  • Transcendent Kingdom by Yaa Gyasi, ISBN: 9780525658184

Workbooks and Mental Health Books

  • Complex PTSD: From Surviving to Thriving by Pete Walker, ISBN: 9781492871842
  • Harm Reduction Guide to Coming Off Psychiatric Drugs by Will Hall, ISBN: 9780980070927
  • Managing your Mental Health during your PhD: A Survival Guide by Dr. Zoë J. Ayres, ISBN: 9783031141935
  • Managing Your Mind: The Mental Fitness Guide by Gillian Butler, ISBN: 9780195314533
  • The Unapologetic Guide to Black Mental Health: Navigate an Unequal System, Learn Tools for Emotional Wellness, and Get the Help you Deserve by Dr. Rheeda Walker, ISBN: 9781684034147
  • The Queer and Transgender Resilience Workbook by Anneliese A. Singh, ISBN: 9781626259461
  • The Gender Quest Workbook: A Guide for Teens and Young Adults Exploring Gender Identity by Rylan Jay Testa, Deborah Coolhart, and Jayme Peta, ISBN: 9781626252974
  • The Reflective Workbook for Partners of Transgender People: Your Transition as Your Partner Transitions by D.M. Maynard, ISBN: 9781785927720

Affirming Religious Texts

  • The Black Trans Prayer Book co-edited by J Mase III and Lady Dan Figueroa Edidi, ISBN: 9781678197612
  • God and the Gay Christian by Matthew Vines, ISBN: 9781601425164
  • Transforming: The Bible & the Lives of Transgender Christians by Austen Hartke, ISBN: 9780664263102
    • Translation in Spanish: TransFormadxs: La Biblia y las Vidas de lxs Cristianxs Transgénero
  • Walking the Bridgeless Canyon: Repairing the Breach Between the Church and the LGBT Community by Kathy Baldock, ASIN: B00OBXN80G
  • We Have Always Been Here: A Queer Muslim Memoir by Samra Habib, ISBN: 9780735235007

Children’s and Illustrated Books

  • The Secret Lives of Scientists, Engineers, and Doctors: Volume 1 by Faisal Hossain, ISBN: 9781645434450
  • Introducing Teddy: A Gentle Story About Gender and Friendship by Jess Walton and illustrated by Dougal MacPherson, ISBN: 9781681192109
  • When Aidan Became A Brother by Kyle Lukoff and illustrated by Kaylani Juanita, ISBN: 9781620148372
  • It Feels Good to Be Yourself: A Book About Gender Identity by Theresa Thorn and illustrated by Noah Grigni, ISBN: 9781250302953

LGBTQ+ YA Fiction

  • I am J by Cris Beam, ISBN: 9780316053617
  • Beautiful Music fo Ugly Children by Kirstin Cronn-Mills, ISBN: 9780738732510
  • Huntress by Malinda Lo, ISBN: 9780316040075
  • Will Grayson, Will Grayson by John Green and David Levithan, ISBN: 9780525421580
  • Little & Lion by Brandy Colbert, ISBN: 9780316349000
  • Felix Ever After by Kacen Callender, ISBN: 9780062820259
  • Stay Gold by Tobly McSmith, ISBN: 9780062943194
  • Openly Straight Series
    • Openly Straight by Bill Konigsberg (Book 1), ISBN: 9780545509893
    • Openly, Honestly by Bill Konigsberg (Book 1.5), ISBN: 9781338171280
    • Honestly Ben by Bill Konigsberg (Book 2), ISBN: 9780545858267
  • Simon Snow Series
    • Carry On by Rainbow Rowell (Book 1), ISBN: 9781250135025
    • Wayward Son by Rainbow Rowell (Book 2), ISBN: 9781250146076
    • Any Way the Wind Blows by Rainbow Rowell (Book 3; Anticipated 2021), ISBN: 9781250254337

Anti-Racist Literature

  • Black Fatigue: How Racism Erodes the Mind, Body, and Spirit by Mary-Frances Winters, ISBN: 9781523091300
  • Caste: The Origins of Our Discontents by Isabel Wilkerson, ISBN: 9780593230251
  • The Color of Law: A Forgotten History of How Our Government Segregated America by Richard Rothstein, ISBN: 9781631492853
  • My Grandmother’s Hands: Racialized Trauma and the Mending of Our Bodies and Hearts by Resmaa Menakem, ISBN: 9781942094470
  • So You Want to Talk About Race by Ijeoma Oluo, ISBN: 9781580056779
  • Superior: The Return of Race Science by Angela Saini, ISBN: 9780807076910
  • White Fragility: Why It’s So Hard for White People to Talk About Racism by Robin DiAngelo, ISBN: 9780807071168

Non-fiction

  • The Autobiography of a Transgender Scientist by Dr. Ben Barres, ISBN: 9780262039116
  • Beyond Magenta: Transgender Teens Speak Out by Susan Kuklin, ISBN: 9780763656119
  • The Bisexual Option by Fred and Fritz Klein, ISBN: 9781560230335
  • Green Card Voices a Book Series
  • High School by Teagan and Sara Quin, ISBN: 9780374169947
  • Inferior: How Science Got Women Wrong—and the New Research That’s Rewriting the Story by Angela Saini, ISBN: 9780807071700
  • Letter to a Young Female Physician: Notes from a Medical Life by Suzanne Koven, ISBN: 9781324007142
  • Raising Them: Our Adventure in Gender Creative Parenting by Kyl Myers, ISBN: 9781542003681
  • Redefining Realness: My Path to Womanhood, Identity, Love & So Much More by Janet Mock, ISBN: 9781476709123
  • The Future Is Disabled: Prophecies, Love Notes, and Mourning Songs by Leah Lakshmi Piepzna-Samarasinha, ISBN: 9781551528915
  • The Remedy: Queer and Trans Voices on Health and Health Care edited by Zena Sharman, ISBN: 9781551526584
  • Trans* in College: Transgender Students’ Strategies for Navigating Campus Life and the Institutional Politics of Inclusion by Dr. Z. Nicolazzo, ISBN: 9781620364574
  • Trans Medicine: The Emergence and Practice of Treating Gender by Dr. stef m. shuster, ISBN: 9781479845378

Other Books

  • Invisible Storm: A Soldier’s Memoir of Politics and PTSD by Jason Kander, ISBN: 9780358658962
  • On Earth We’re Briefly Gorgeous by Ocean Vuong, ISBN: 9780525562023
